name: ECS services should not have public IP addresses assigned to them automatically
query:
{
  ecsServices(where: {hasECSServiceNetworkConfigurations_SOME: { assignPublicIP: true}}) {
    identifier
    accountID
    cloudAccountID
    cloudAccountName
    cloudProvider
    idFromProvider
    internalAssetType
    internalName
    internalRegion
    assetCategory
    contentHash
  }
}
